baseRule.text: Yo pana bhikkhu nānappakārakaṁ rūpiyasaṁvohāraṁ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
baseRule.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 19

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer mit Geld (rūpiya) verschiedene Waren erwirbt, muß (das Erworbene) aushändigen und dafür sühnen.
If a monk trades with money in various ways, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
Si un bhikkhu se involucra en [uno de los] diversos tipos de intercambio monetario, él [ingreso]: ha de ser renunciado y confesado.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。以金銀買種種物。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 19

fullParallels.text: 若比丘種種用金。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 19

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻種種出納求利者。泥薩祇波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 19

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。以金銀及錢種種賣買。尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 29

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。種種販賣生色似色。尼薩耆波夜提。二十竟
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 20

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！種種賣買寶物者，尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 19

translations.text: If a monk engage in the purchase or sale of different precious substances (jewels) it is Nissaggiya Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu membeli atau menjual barang-barang berharga, ia melakukan sebuah naiḥsargika pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘種種賣買金銀寶物者。尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 19

fullParallels.text: 若比丘種種貿易寶物。尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 19

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī nānappakārakaṁ rūpiyasaṁvohāraṁ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya pācittiya 22

translations.text: Welche Nonne auch immer mit Geld (Rūpiya) verschiedene Waren erwirbt, muß (das Erworbene) aushändigen und dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni engage in various types of monetary exchange, it (the income) is to be forfeited and confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang terlibat dalam berbagai jenis pertukaran moneter, (pendapatan) itu harus di sita dan di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，種種買賣寶物者，尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 10

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼以金銀及錢種種賣買。尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 17

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。種種用寶者。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 10

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼種種出納求利者。泥薩祇波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 12

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。種種販賣生色似色者。尼薩耆波夜提。
